mapper.select: select inbound_id, employee_id, document, inbound_date, clerk_name, inbound_type, review_date, department, inbound_remark, inbound_creater, inbound_reviewer, inbound_approver, inbound_closer, inbound_state, create_date from accessories_inbound where inbound_id = #{inboundId}

select inbound_id, employee_id, document, inbound_date, clerk_name, inbound_type, review_date, department, inbound_remark, inbound_creater, inbound_reviewer, inbound_approver, inbound_closer, inbound_state, create_date from accessories_inbound
and inbound_id like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundId},'%')
and employee_id like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.employeeId},'%')
and document like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.document},'%')
and inbound_date like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundDate},'%')
and clerk_name like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.clerkName},'%')
and inbound_type like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundType},'%')
and review_date like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.reviewDate},'%')
and department like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.department},'%')
and inbound_remark like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundRemark},'%')
and inbound_creater like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundCreater},'%')
and inbound_reviewer like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundReviewer},'%')
and inbound_approver like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundApprover},'%')
and inbound_closer like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundCloser},'%')
and inbound_state like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundState},'%')
and create_date like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.createDate},'%')
limit #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}

select count(1) from accessories_inbound
and inbound_id like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundId},'%')
and employee_id like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.employeeId},'%')
and document like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.document},'%')
and inbound_date like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundDate},'%')
and clerk_name like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.clerkName},'%')
and inbound_type like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundType},'%')
and review_date like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.reviewDate},'%')
and department like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.department},'%')
and inbound_remark like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundRemark},'%')
and inbound_creater like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundCreater},'%')
and inbound_reviewer like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundReviewer},'%')
and inbound_approver like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundApprover},'%')
and inbound_closer like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundCloser},'%')
and inbound_state like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.inboundState},'%')
and create_date like concat('%',#{accessoriesInbound.createDate},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into accessories_inbound(employee_id, document, inbound_date, clerk_name, inbound_type, review_date, department, inbound_remark, inbound_creater, inbound_reviewer, inbound_approver, inbound_closer, inbound_state, create_date) values (#{employeeId}, #{document}, #{inboundDate}, #{clerkName}, #{inboundType}, #{reviewDate}, #{department}, #{inboundRemark}, #{inboundCreater}, #{inboundReviewer}, #{inboundApprover}, #{inboundCloser}, #{inboundState}, #{createDate})

insert into accessories_inbound(employee_id, document, inbound_date, clerk_name, inbound_type, review_date, department, inbound_remark, inbound_creater, inbound_reviewer, inbound_approver, inbound_closer, inbound_state, create_date) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.document}, #{entity.inboundDate}, #{entity.clerkName}, #{entity.inboundType}, #{entity.reviewDate}, #{entity.department}, #{entity.inboundRemark}, #{entity.inboundCreater}, #{entity.inboundReviewer}, #{entity.inboundApprover}, #{entity.inboundCloser}, #{entity.inboundState}, #{entity.createDate})

insert into accessories_inbound(employee_id, document, inbound_date, clerk_name, inbound_type, review_date, department, inbound_remark, inbound_creater, inbound_reviewer, inbound_approver, inbound_closer, inbound_state, create_date) values
(#{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.document}, #{entity.inboundDate}, #{entity.clerkName}, #{entity.inboundType}, #{entity.reviewDate}, #{entity.department}, #{entity.inboundRemark}, #{entity.inboundCreater}, #{entity.inboundReviewer}, #{entity.inboundApprover}, #{entity.inboundCloser}, #{entity.inboundState}, #{entity.createDate})
on duplicate key update employee_id = values(employee_id), document = values(document), inbound_date = values(inbound_date), clerk_name = values(clerk_name), inbound_type = values(inbound_type), review_date = values(review_date), department = values(department), inbound_remark = values(inbound_remark), inbound_creater = values(inbound_creater), inbound_reviewer = values(inbound_reviewer), inbound_approver = values(inbound_approver), inbound_closer = values(inbound_closer), inbound_state = values(inbound_state), create_date = values(create_date)
mapper.update:
update accessories_inbound
employee_id = #{employeeId},
document = #{document},
inbound_date = #{inboundDate},
clerk_name = #{clerkName},
inbound_type = #{inboundType},
review_date = #{reviewDate},
department = #{department},
inbound_remark = #{inboundRemark},
inbound_creater = #{inboundCreater},
inbound_reviewer = #{inboundReviewer},
inbound_approver = #{inboundApprover},
inbound_closer = #{inboundCloser},
inbound_state = #{inboundState},
create_date = #{createDate},
where inbound_id = #{inboundId}
